name: Pivotway Leads Generator
author: Pivotway

sections.description:
This plugin inserts Pivotway’s Leads Generator script in your WordPress site so you don’t have to edit your theme’s code. It’s the first step you need to take in order to embed our lead generation widgets in your website.

Once the plugin is installed and activated, you can insert our widgets in your website by pasting the following code snippets where you want them to appear.

Sidabar Widget
<div class=”pw-form pw-sidebar” data-pw-userid=”{your_id}” ></div>

Inline Widget
<div class=”pw-form pw-inline” data-pw-userid=”{your_id}” ></div>

Sticky Bar & Popup widgets can be activated/deactivated on our website

Remember to replace the {your_id} by your Pivotway’s user ID on the above snippets. If you don’t know your Pivotway’s user ID you can obtain it from our website.
sections.installation:
1. Upload leads-generator.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress
  3. Make sure the wp_footer(); code snippet is just before the </body> closing tag in your theme
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload leads-generator.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress
  3. Make sure the wp_footer(); code snippet is just before the </body> closing tag in your theme

Available languages

Our website is available in English and Spanish. However, you can customize your forms to be displayed in any language you want.

Where can I obtain my Pivotway user ID?

You can obtain it by visiting our website and logging in to your Control Panel, under the “Forms” section.

How can I customize the Widgets that appear on my website?

You can customize them on the Forms section of our website.

Where can I check out a live example of the Widgets?

On this website you can check out the Sidebar Form, the Inline Form and the Sticky Bar.

short_description: Pivotway is an easy way to automate your inbound marketing. Transform your website into a lead generation machine and drive revenue to your business.
